verifyEmailPage.title: Verify your email
verifyEmailPage.welcomeMessage: We're thrilled to welcome you to the Onefarm Tech community! To access all the amazing features waiting for you, simply verify your email address. We just sent a verification link straight to your inbox. (check your spam folder just in case).
verifyEmailPage.requestNewLink: No worries! Simply click the button below to request a new verification link.
